member.name: DXCoreHardwareID
member.summary: Represents the PnP hardware ID parts for an adapter.

member.name: DXCoreHardwareID.vendorID
member.summary: The PCI ID of the adapter's hardware vendor.

member.name: DXCoreHardwareID.deviceID
member.summary: The PCI ID of the adapter's hardware device.

member.name: DXCoreHardwareID.subSysID
member.summary: The PCI ID of the adapter's hardware subsystem.

member.name: DXCoreHardwareID.revision
member.summary: The PCI ID of the adapter's revision number.
